title: US awards $47m to commercialise ‘transformational’ energy technologies
lead: It is supporting ‘high risk and potentially disruptive’ new electric vehicle battery, data centre efficiency, grid modernisation, emissions mitigation and storage technologies

title: UK Space Agency and Rolls-Royce join forces to develop nuclear-powered spacecraft engine
lead: The technology is predicted to halve the projected duration of journeys to Mars to up to four months

title: Welsh Government sets out plan for Clean Air Bill with coal burning ban and wet wood restrictions
lead: The proposals are part of a consultation published alongside plans for a new clean air law for Wales

title: National Grid ESO hails 2020 as the greenest year ever for Britain’s electricity
lead: The country was powered coal-free for around 5,147 hours last year, compared with 3,666 hours in 2019

title: UK commits £3bn of climate finance to support nature and biodiversity
lead: Programmes supported will include the flagship Blue Planet Fund for marine conversation as well as projects to maintain forests and tackle the illegal timber trade and deforestation

title: Further five-day GMB strike announced as ‘fire and rehire’ row continues with British Gas
lead: The industrial action is set to start on 20th January

title: Energy bills storm approaches as UK households ‘face £84m cost rise by the end of January’
lead: Consumers could see their bills swell by £171 on average after the end of their fixed deals

title: Almost 35% of renewable sector professionals ‘received pay rise in 2020’
lead: A further 67% of renewables professionals are optimistic of a pay increase in 2021, according to a new report

title: Enough wind power was curtailed in 2020 to power a million homes for a year
lead: A new report suggests an additional 20GWh of battery storage could see the amount of wind power wasted annually reduced by up to 50%

title: EU bank invests €50m to roll out EV charging stations in Spain
lead: More than 470 fast and ultra-fast charging stations will be deployed along Spanish motorways
